items.content_html: A lightweight browser-based car racing game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Steer your car to avoid oncoming traffic and see how long you can last! * Features Smooth keyboard controls (Arrow keys) Increasing difficulty over time Score tracking Responsive design No external libraries – pure HTML, CSS, and JS. Supports Multiplayer.
items.title: tanishqv07/CarRace: A lightweight browser-based car racing game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Steer your car to avoid oncoming traffic and see how long you can last!  * Features Smooth keyboard controls (Arrow keys)  Increasing difficulty over time  Score tracking  Responsive design  No external libraries – pure HTML, CSS, and JS. Supports Multiplayer.

items.content_html: TrackLens is a lightweight, AI-powered system that detects and tracks objects like cars, pedestrians, and bicycles in real-time from video files. It processes each frame to identify objects, label them, and output an annotated video. Ideal for traffic monitoring, surveillance, and urban analysis, TrackLens offers a fast, customizable foundation.
items.title: devanshrahatal/TrackLens: TrackLens is a lightweight, AI-powered system that detects and tracks objects like cars, pedestrians, and bicycles in real-time from video files. It processes each frame to identify objects, label them, and output an annotated video. Ideal for traffic monitoring, surveillance, and urban analysis, TrackLens offers a fast, customizable foundation.

items.content_html: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. 🚀
